articles.author: Christian Borjon Valencia
articles.title: Gold Price Forecast: XAU/USD retreats from all-time-high, as US bond yields advance - FXStreet
articles.description: Gold price plunges more than 2% in early trading during the North American session on Monday after reaching an all-time-high (ATH) due to money market futures traders increasing bets the US Federal Reserve (Fed) would slash rates next year.
articles.content:
• Gold price experiences a significant drop of over 2%, after reaching a record high of $2,135.40.
  • Fed Chair Jerome Powell's recent remarks emphasized caution, stating that the Fed is p… [+2117 chars]
